controller

Class PlantController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.PlantController

  • public class PlantController
extends java.lang.Object
    The HarvestController class coordinates the functions available in the Data Managers for the Menu class. It manages PlotDataManager, FarmerDataManager, CropDataManager, RankDataManager, and InventoryDataManager.

    • Constructor Summary

      PlantController()
      Constructs a PlantController object and Initialises Data Managers

      • plant

        public void plant(Farmer f,
         int plotNo,
         java.lang.String cropName)
           throws java.io.IOException
        This method plantings crop on a plot.
        Parameters:
        f - The Farmer object that is currently logging on.
        plotNo - The choice of plot user decides to plant
        cropName - The name of crop user decides to plant
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Throw exception when there is no plots.csv or inventory.csv

        Parameters:
